roleset.name: leave out (of)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Hudson General, which provides maintenance, fueling and other services to airlines and airports, reported a loss for its most recent fiscal year and last month omitted the semiannual dividend on its common shares.
example.arg: Hudson General, which provides maintenance, fueling and other services to airlines and airports,
the semiannual dividend on its common shares

example.name: frequently passive
example.text: [Estimated and actual results involving losses]-1 are omitted *trace*-1.

example.name: with source
example.text: He plans to tell clients to pay certain fees directly to the foundation instead of to him; he would omit those fees from income reported on his return.
example.arg: from income reported on his return

roleset.note: Based on WSJ, automatic expansion via verbnet. Member of VNcls remove-10.1, neglect-75-1.
